import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { StyledIdentification, Form, StyledInput, Text, DangerText, ButtonSubmit } from './styles'; const Identification = ({ name, category, dificulty, showDanger, submitForm }) => { console.log(showDanger); return (
TEQUIZ To start the game, fill out the form {':)'}
Name {showDanger.showDanger && 'Name is required!'} name.setName(event.target.value)} /> Category Dificulty START GAME
); }; export default Identification;
